name: Tactical Awareness Beacon Systems
overview:
TABS (Tacitical Awareness Beacon Systems) - Asset Tracking Specialists

TABS designs, manufactures and programs the ShadowCash / TrackSting Solution.

ShadowCash is the most effective and cost effective solution to tracking and acquiring stolen bank cash. Shadow Cash’s low profile, flexible and robust design allow it to be used in a variety of tracking situations and conditions.

The primary components of Shadow Cash unit are advanced cellular and GPS connectivity chips matched with a felxible board design. Cutting edge battery technology allows for a low profile form factor , unprecedented tracking times as well as long periods between charges.

Shadow Cash fits nicely in a stack of cash, is flexible, and can be placed seamlessly in a cash drawer along side regular, non-tracking cash. For alternative situations the core unit can be fitted with a larger battery and a variety of sensors to fit customer needs.

Shadow Cash is complemented by (TrackSting) Tactical Awareness Beacon Systems back end software which tracks each Shadow Cash unit in real time. TrackSting also has a wide selection of alarms utilizing geo spatial tracking, and customizable sensors which can be integrated into Shadow Cash.

Once a ShadowCash unit is activated, a signal gets sent to TrackSting. Monitoring personal are then alerted via an auditory alarm as well as a visual alarm. The monitor can then follow the stolen unit seamlessly and in real time. Thus ensuring capture and the return of the cash.

funding_rounds.source_description: Tactical Awareness Beacon Systems LLC Receives $500k from Connecticut Innovations
